SAD BANGER TAB

(capo third fret)
VERSE

B |--5---5---|--5---5---5-------------------------------------------------------
G |--2---2---|--2---4---4-------------------------------------------------------
D |--3---2---|--2---2---3-------------------------------------------------------

CHORUS
